option.value: {"C:/Users/meira/OneDrive/Documents/safeVision":"{\"/encyption/aes.cpp\":\"`AES`: An implementation of the AES-256 encryption algorithm.\\n\\n`mul`: Performs multiplication in the Galois Field GF(2^8).\\n`keyExpansion`: Expands the 32-byte AES-256 key into a 240-byte round key.\\n`cipher`: Performs the AES-256 encryption algorithm on a 16-byte block of data.\\n`invCipher`: Performs the AES-256 decryption algorithm on a 16-byte block of ciphertext.\\n`subBytes`: Applies the AES S-box substitution to each byte in the state.\\n`invSubBytes`: Applies the inverse AES S-box substitution to each byte in the state.\\n`addRoundKey`: XORs the state with the corresponding round key.\\n`shiftRows`: Performs the AES row shift transformation on the state.\\n`invShiftRows`: Performs the inverse AES row shift transformation on the state.\\n`mixColumns`: Performs the AES column mixing transformation on the state.\\n`invMixColumns`: Performs the inverse AES column mixing transformation on the state.\\n`pkcs7Pad`: Pads a data vector to a multiple of the AES block size using PKCS#7 padding.\\n`pkcs7Unpad`: Removes PKCS#7 padding from a data vector.\\n`toHex`: Converts a vector of bytes to a hexadecimal string.\\n\\nThe file provides a complete implementation of the AES-256 encryption algorithm, including key expansion, encryption, decryption, and padding/unpadding functions.\",\"/encyption/gcm.cpp\":\"`GCM`: A class that implements the Galois/Counter Mode (GCM) of operation for the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm.\\n\\n`pad`: A helper function that pads a vector of bytes to a multiple of 16 bytes.\\n`xor_bytes`: A helper function that performs a bitwise XOR operation on two vectors of bytes.\\n`mul`: Performs Galois Field multiplication on two 128-bit vectors.\\n`ghash`: Computes the GHASH function used in GCM.\\n`inc32`: Increments the rightmost 32 bits of a 128-bit vector.\\n`gctr`: Implements the GCTR mode of operation for GCM.\\n`setKey`: Sets the AES key for the GCM object.\\n`encrypt`: Encrypts plaintext using GCM.\\n`decrypt`: Decrypts ciphertext using GCM.\\n`generate_key`: Generates a random 256-bit AES key.\\n\\nThe file implements the GCM mode of operation for the AES algorithm, providing functions for encryption, decryption, and key generation.\",\"/README.md\":\"This file does not contain any classes or functions. It appears to be a document with two instances of the hashtag \\\"#safevVsion\\\". Without any additional context, it is difficult to determine the purpose or meaning of this content.\",\"/camera/camera.py\":\"This file appears to be importing the OpenCV (Computer Vision) library, which is a popular library for image and video processing. The file itself does not contain any classes or functions, but rather serves as an import statement to make the OpenCV library available for use in the rest of the code.\"}"}
